text: Usne aasmaano ko paida kiya bagair sutuno (pillars) ke jo tumko nazar aayein .Usne zameen mein pahadh jamaa diye taa-ke woh tumhein lekar dhulak (turn /shake) na jaye. Usne har tarah ke jaanwar zameen mein phayla diye aur aasmaan se pani barsaya aur zameen mein qisam qisam ke umda cheezein uga di
